projectDescription: Retrofitting older buildings with modern energy-saving technologies and structural improvements to extend their lifespan and enhance efficiency.

milestones.title: Project Initiation and Planning
milestones.description: Feasibility study, Site inspection, Gathering of requirements, Preparation of project plan, Risk assessment, Budget estimation
milestones.paymentDetails: : Upon completion of this milestone, 15% of the total project cost will be due.

milestones.title: Design and Development
milestones.description: Detailed energy audit, Identification of retrofitting opportunities, Design of retrofitting solutions, Development of implementation plan, Approval of retrofitting design and plan
milestones.paymentDetails: : Upon completion of this milestone, 25% of the total project cost will be due.

milestones.title: Procurement and Installation
milestones.description: Procurement of necessary materials and equipment, Installation of energy-saving technologies, Structural improvements, Site clean-up
milestones.paymentDetails: : Upon completion of this milestone, 30% of the total project cost will be due.

milestones.title: Testing and Commissioning
milestones.description: Testing of installed systems, Commissioning of the building, Training of building staff, Documentation
milestones.paymentDetails: : Upon completion of this milestone, 20% of the total project cost will be due.

milestones.title: Project Closure
milestones.description: Monitoring and evaluation of building performance, Fine-tuning of systems, Preparation of final report, Project handover
milestones.paymentDetails: : Upon completion of the project, the remaining 10% of the total project cost will be due.
